TopicTitle: Did any part of the aerodymanics model change in .21?

Articles.Content:
This is a shuttle I built, which is capable of everything from docking to my LKO station to landing on the Mun, then Minmus, and then return to Kerbin on the runway, but I have to re-enter at a very shallow angle or else those front two wing connectors break off, even if I am only going ~110m/s. I've used that wing connector+small control surface combo on other planes in the past, and nothing was broken. I suspect that it could be the result of a weird bug I found where the little puffs of smoke that randomly appear on occasion, collide with my craft, causing it to yaw a bit.

If enough people decide that this is actually a bug, I'd be nice if a mod could move this to the bugs/support forum.
No way that thing can get off Kerbin

No way that thing can get off Kerbin

Oh, no, there is a launch vehicle that consists of a mainsail (one and a half orange tanks worth) with two skippers (one orange tank) asparagused to them, and a skipper engine (720 units of fuel) for orbital insertion.
